code: import React,{Component}from'react';import GuestNav from'./guestnav';import UserNav from'./usernav';class UserMenu extends Component{render(){const _this$props=this.props,isAuthenticated=_this$props.isAuthenticated,username=_this$props.username,name=_this$props.name,avatar=_this$props.avatar,logout=_this$props.logout,isLoading=_this$props.isLoading,showRegister=_this$props.showRegister,showLogin=_this$props.showLogin,showEditProfile=_this$props.showEditProfile;if(isAuthenticated){return React.createElement(UserNav,{username:username,name:name,avatar:avatar,logout:logout,showEditProfile:showEditProfile,isLoading:isLoading});}else{return React.createElement(GuestNav,{showRegister:showRegister,showLogin:showLogin});}}}export default UserMenu;
